message:
Urgent urgent urgent 
BLOOD NEEDED!!!  Rare group of blood (AB-). Spread as many as possible so that she can get the help ASAP.
Samiya Khan is in Uttara 11,Mansur Ali Medical College after Quota Andolon. She needs 3 bag of Ab negative blood  immediately. Please help, It’s urgent 
Please contact -
 +8801700-627385,
+8801939819365
 Uttara 11, Mansur Ali Medical College
(ঢাকার মানুষেরা একটু কপি পেস্ট করে শেয়ার দেন প্লিজ)
Copied
